[`var kAudioFile3GP2Type: AudioFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiofile3gp2type)A 3GPP2 file, suitable for video content on CDMA mobile phones.[`var kAudioFile3GPType: AudioFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiofile3gptype)A 3GPP file, suitable for video content on GSM mobile phones.[`var kAudioFileAAC_ADTSType: AudioFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiofileaac_adtstype)An Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) Audio Data Transport Stream (ADTS) file.[`var kAudioFileAC3Type: AudioFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiofileac3type)An AC-3 file.[`var kAudioFileAIFCType: AudioFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiofileaifctype)An Audio Interchange File Format Compressed (AIFF-C) file.[`var kAudioFileAIFFType: AudioFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiofileaifftype)An Audio Interchange File Format (AIFF) file.[`var kAudioFileAMRType: AudioFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiofileamrtype)An AMR (Adaptive Multi-Rate) file suitable for compressed speech.[`var kAudioFileCAFType: AudioFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiofilecaftype)A Core Audio File Format file.[`var kAudioFileM4AType: AudioFileTypeID`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiofilem4atype)An M4A file.[`var
